decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 023-PE-BA-00-DR-A-0001 Rev P02, 023-PE-00-99-DR-A-9904 Rev P02 (received 11/06/2013)
72/0009797-1141 Rev A (received 15/08/2013)
023-PE-BA-00-DR-A-0002 Rev P04 (received 07/08/2013)
023-PE-BA-00-DR-A-0004 Rev P02 (received 21/08/2013)
023-PE-BA-22-DR-A-0805 Rev P01 (received 22/08/2013)  therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - Prior to the 31st October 2015 the buildings hereby approved shall be removed from the site and the ground returned to its former condition.

Condition : 4 - Within 3 months of classroom 1 being removed from the site the landscaping scheme shown on drawing 023-PE-BA-00-DR-A-0004 Rev P02 (received 21/08/2013) shall be implemented in accordance with that drawing.
description: Demolition of existing classroom block and modular building.  Temporary relocation of a modular building and erection of a temporary modular building.
